intro: Spot clever felines tucked into fairy tale scenes! Hunt for 100 cats in each magical zone, plus discover all special hidden treasures. A purrfect puzzle adventure!
description:
Dive into a breathtaking adventure where 500+ mischievous cats have scampered into the most enchanting fairy-tale realms!

Explore fantasy villages with cobblestone streets and cozy cottages, magical forests glowing with fireflies and talking trees, and even a spellbinding magic school where curious kittens hide among floating books and bubbling potions.

Each location holds 100 cleverly hidden cats—some snoozing in barrels, others peeking from behind wizard hats! But the real challenge? Uncovering the 5 legendary collectibles, each tied to a secret feline legend.

With charming animations, interactive surprises, and endless purr-sonalities, this game is a treasure hunt like no other!
